scripts.build: npm run build-styles && npm run copy
scripts.build-styles: npx tailwindcss build src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css -c tailwind.config.js
scripts.copy: npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-scripts && npm run copy-html
scripts.copy-assets: if [ -d src/assets ]; then cp -rv src/assets/. dist/assets/; fi
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy-settings
